remarks: Strong (or "total") induction principle over the finite ordinals. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 17-Jul-2015.)
statement:
omsinds.1 $e |- ( x = y -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
omsinds.2 $e |- ( x = A -> ( ph <-> ch ) ) $.
omsinds.3 $e |- ( x e. _om -> ( A. y e. x ps -> ph ) ) $.
omsinds $p |- ( A e. _om -> ch ) $.
$d A x $.
$d ch x $.
$d ph y $.
$d ps x $.
$d x y $.
